mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(RT.ROOMTYPE, '전체') AS ROOMTYPE, IFNULL(SUM(IF(B.ROOMNUMBER IS NULL, 0, RT.ROOMPRICE)), 0) AS TODAYSALES FROM ROOMTYPE RT LEFT JOIN BOOKING B ON B.ROOMTYPE = RT.ROOMTYPE AND CURDATE() BETWEEN B.CHECKINDATE AND B.CHECKOUTDATE GROUP BY RT.ROOMTYPE WITH ROLLUP;
SELECT ROOMTYPE, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOOKING WHERE DATE(CHECKINDATE) = CURDATE() GROUP BY ROOMTYPE;

SELECT CASE WHEN R.ROOMTYPE IS NULL THEN '전체' ELSE R.ROOMTYPE END AS ROOMTYPE, COALESCE(SUM((B.CHECKOUTDATE - B.CHECKINDATE)*R.ROOMPRICE), 0) AS TOTAL FROM ROOMTYPE R LEFT JOIN BOOKING B ON R.ROOMTYPE = B.ROOMTYPE AND B.PAYMENTDATE BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m'), '-01') AND CURDATE() GROUP BY R.ROOMTYPE WITH ROLLUP;

SELECT CASE WHEN R.ROOMTYPE IS NULL THEN '전체' ELSE R.ROOMTYPE END AS ROOMTYPE, COALESCE(SUM((B.CHECKOUTDATE - B.CHECKINDATE)*R.ROOMPRICE), 0) AS TOTAL FROM ROOMTYPE R LEFT JOIN BOOKING B ON R.ROOMTYPE = B.ROOMTYPE AND B.PAYMENTDATE BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m'), '-01') AND #{endDate} GROUP BY R.ROOMTYPE WITH ROLLUP;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKING WHERE PAYMENTDATE=#{paymentDate}
SELECT ROOMTYPE, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOOKING b WHERE CHECKINDATE >= DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y-%m-01') AND PAYMENTDATE <= CURDATE() GROUP BY ROOMTYPE;
SELECT ROOMTYPE, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM BOOKING b WHERE CHECKINDATE >= DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE, '%Y-%m-01') AND PAYMENTDATE <= #{endDate} GROUP BY ROOMTYPE;
